Desc.entry: Runs creative art clubs in schools for children aged 4-12 years, includes Saturday clubs, after school clubs and holiday clubs. Holiday clubs include Cookery Club, Art Club and Young Illustrators Story Club. The objective of the Academy is to provide the opportunity for children to develop their artistic skills and have lots of fun, whilst learning new artistic techniques. The children are also taught how to develop their ideas and in doing so make their imaginations become a reality. Ofsted registered and can therefore accept child care vouchers.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sat 1-3.30pm (Saturday Creative Arts Club); please contact for details of school holiday Cookery Club, Art Club and Young Illustrators Story Club
